identity.name: EventPass
identity.description: A high-density, professional event management platform that balances complex data visualization with creative freedom for badge design.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Poster aesthetics with SaaS utility.
Content is King: Data density without clutter.
Zoom In: Focus on the details (badge pixels, attendee data).
Negative Space: Use whitespace to separate complex modules.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in variable lighting conditions.

usage.headings: Chivo - Use for page titles and major section headers.
usage.body: IBM Plex Sans - Use for all standard text, tables, and form inputs.
usage.code: JetBrains Mono - Use for API keys, IDs, and technical data.

layout.spacing_system: Generous spacing (2-3x standard). Use p-6, p-8, p-12 for containers.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays on dark backgrounds to prevent banding.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Implement the Badge Designer first as it is the priority feature. Use a canvas-based approach (HTML5 Canvas or absolute positioned divs).
2. Use the 'Control Room' grid for the main dashboard.
3. Ensure the sidebar is collapsible to maximize screen real estate for the Badge Designer.
4. Use the provided logos for branding. The 'Grow Up' logo represents the current tenant.
5. For the Badge Designer, ensure the canvas is strictly 4x6 aspect ratio and supports drag-and-drop.
7. Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
8. Do NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Chivo' or 'IBM Plex Sans' as specified.
9. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the sidebar and top bar structure.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
